article_title: J.P. Morgan and Assurant Agree to Settle 'Forced' Insurance Suit
article_text:
J.P. Morgan Chase & Co. and Assurant Inc. agreed to a settlement under which they could pay about $300 million total to resolve allegations in a class-action lawsuit that they overcharged borrowers for a type of homeowners' insurance.

The proposed settlement is one of the first and biggest in a number of plaintiffs' lawsuits over "forced-place" insurance that are winding their way through courts. The litigation focuses on a little-known practice that allegedly left hundreds of thousands of struggling...
